summary: Ability that triggers different transformations based on the actor's race.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Mod Description:[/u]
 - Adds a spell that transforms the actor (Player or NPC) based on the actor's race.
 - Adds an ability to trigger this transformation when the actor is hit with less than 30% Health remaining. After 60 seconds, it will transform the actor back, naked and unequipped.


[b]Update 1.2:[/b]
Minor updates to the script: Should keep the actor from accidentally dying now when they shift back with low health. Turns off bounty for the player when transformed, sets AttackOnSight to true while the player is transformed. That's about it I think. I don't really like the way the ability is set up, triggering on the actor if they hit that static 30% health value. Any suggestions?

[b]Update 1.1:[/b]
DLC version adds a spell that gives the Polymorph Ability to an actor on touch. Give yourself the 'Grant Polymorph Form' spell via console commands and use it on your follower, or run through Jorrvaskr and make the Companions actually use their Beast Blood once in awhile?
[size=4][b]
[/b][/size]Tried to make a version that's a little more user friendly. Aligns most of the race transformations to DLC creatures, however Jackalheads camera fixes don't include the DLC creatures, so it wont work on the player as of yet.

Currently the esp aligns transformations as follows:
Nord - Werewolf
Imperial - GargoyleBoss
Breton - WereBear
Redguard - Storm Atronach
HighElf - VampireLord
DarkElf - Lurker
WoodElf - BurntSpriggan
Orc - Troll
Argonian - Chaurus Hunter
Khajiit - Ash Guardian

The script [b]still[/b] has a lot of unused references by default. The script provides slots for each race to equip different weapons, spells in either hand, shout, a perk, and an ability, specific to the transformation. These just need to be set in the CK. Please feel free to edit this mod to your liking, or using it as a base for another awesome effect.

[size=3][color=#ff0000]Requirements:
[/color]Skyrim
Update
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

To make transformations work on the player (vanilla creatures):
[color=#f4f4f4]Jackalheads Complete Playable Monsters Fix (Doesnt include DLC creature camera fixes)[/color][/size]
